unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We've had success at IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Our focus is on candidates demonstrating leadership potential. Dr. Sharma’s team is evaluating applications for roles starting 15 August. The package is Rs. 6 Lakhs CTC, plus benefits. We're seeking individuals to manage projects across 10,000 sq ft. offices in Bangalore. Jai Hind!
